item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2013/10/spirit-r-recaros/#comment-99721">Gavin D</a>.
A local shop did this for me. They simply traced it off the original cloth Recaro skin. Check with your local upholstery shops, they should be able to do the same.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Gavin D.

A local shop did this for me. They simply traced it off the original cloth Recaro skin. Check with your local upholstery shops, they should be able to do the same.

item.title: By: Gavin D
item.dc:creator: Gavin D
item.description: hi mate, The people who did your covers would they be able to do another set without the seats? Did they make a pattern etc..? I live in Australia and would love to have mine trimmed like that.
item.content:encoded:
hi mate,
The people who did your covers would they be able to do another set without the seats? Did they make a pattern etc..? I live in Australia and would love to have mine trimmed like that.

item.title: By: Will
item.dc:creator: Will
item.description: Looking really good. Can't wait to see some updated pictures of the entire interior!
item.content:encoded: Looking really good. Can’t wait to see some updated pictures of the entire interior!

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2013/10/spirit-r-recaros/#comment-69155">Nikolai B.G</a>.
Thanks Nikolai! They were a lofty investment, but I think they will be worth it in the long run ;)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nikolai B.G.

Thanks Nikolai! They were a lofty investment, but I think they will be worth it in the long run ;)

item.title: By: Nikolai B.G
item.dc:creator: Nikolai B.G
item.description: Holy shitballs..! Those seats look AMAZING! Can't believe how good they look in suede skin. Bravo.
item.content:encoded:
Holy shitballs..!
Those seats look AMAZING! Can’t believe how good they look in suede skin. Bravo.
